name: Property Listings
description: A comprehensive database of properties for sale or rent, including detailed descriptions, photos, and virtual tours.

name: Search and Filtering
description: A robust search functionality that allows users to filter properties by location, price range, property type, amenities, and other criteria to find their ideal property.

name: Agent Directory
description: A directory of licensed real estate agents and brokers, allowing users to find and contact local experts who can assist with buying, selling, or renting properties.

name: Mortgage Calculators and Financing Tools
description: Interactive tools that help users estimate mortgage payments, calculate affordability, and explore financing options, making it easier to navigate the home buying process.

name: Neighborhood Insights and Community Information
description: Detailed information about neighborhoods, including local schools, transportation, shopping, and community amenities, to help users make informed decisions about their next home.
